titles.title: ELITE Act of 2020
ELITE Act of 2020
Equality in Leadership and Inclusion in Top Elements Act of 2020

A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to enter into an agreement with a federally funded research and development center for a study on the barriers to minority participation in the elite units of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Equality in Leadership and Inclusion in Top Elements Act of 2020 or the ELITE Act of 2020
This bill directs the Department of the Defense to seek to enter into an agreement with a federally funded research and development center with relevant expertise to conduct an evaluation of the barriers to minority participation in specified units of the Armed Forces.
